titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on certain chemicals.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10582-10583)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1996, the suspension of duty on: (1) Neville and Winter's acid; (2) broenner's acid; (3) D salt; (4) napthol AS types; and (5) anis base.
